UCM time series model
6
Unobserved Components Model (UCM) performs a time series decomposition into components such as trend, seasonal, cycle, and the regression effects due 
to predictor series. It can be represented as follows:
Seasonal unobserved component is capturing 
annual cycles and is assumed deterministic. It 
is implemented with 12 DOF (13-1 binary 
variables, 4 weeks each) 
Slope unobserved component is capturing the 
long-term changes on quantity and is assumed 
deterministic
Level unobserved component is capturing the 
variation of the base quantity and is assumed 
stochastic

external factor ð‘‹1(price) and an additional
